comment._content: Performing artists from Italy: Vincenzo Reschiglian (1874-1955), opera singer: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reschiglian Luca Botta (1882-1917), opera singer: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luca_Botta Rosina Galli (1896-1940), dancer: fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosina_Galli_%28danseuse%29 Giovanni Martinelli (1885-1969), opera singer: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Martinelli fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Martinelli
